readable.title: 241347300_7c84ecf764
readable.content: A football player being tackled from behind by another player from a different team in front of a crowd . A football player in a Sooners jersey , runs down a field with a large crowd in the background . A football player in red being tackled by opponents in white . A football player wearing a number 23 white jersey tackles a football player wearing a red , number three jersey while fans cheer . A football tackle in progress with a crowd in the background .
